subject: 1 minute credit card decision
body:
251839499You are receiving this FinancialRange e-mail from rangedomains.com.  To view this email as a web page, click on this link.









	If you're having problems getting a credit card due to past credit history, this may be the offer for you.  To apply is quick and easy.  Your First PREMIER Gold Card will feature:
Apply today to start enjoying our great benefits: 
	



Low APR on Purchases



24 Hour Account Access by Phone



Monthly credit bureau reporting
































If you received this message in error or to cancel your subscription, please follow this link.163 3rd Avenue, #277, New York, NY 10003
